Text:
You really ought to upgrade to a modern bit torrent client, such as uTorrent or Vuze.
The old BitComet crap that you created this torrent with has been obsolete for years.

velvet

I would try utorrent. Thanks for suggestion.

To velvet.
I use the old BitComet 0.63 too,I like it for many reasons,1 being that I can personally ban those who haven`t configured their client properly,and are sharing empty packets (errors which count against bandwidth).I have tried utorrent,and personally,I think it sucks bigtime.
